sentences.sContent: Only 60 years ago, the land around Moyale was savannah with plenty of grass, big trees and elephants, lions and rhino.
sentences.sContent_eng: Only 60 years ago, the land around Moyale was savannah with plenty of grass, big trees and elephants, lions and rhino.
sentences.sCn: 仅仅60年前，莫耶尔周围是一片有丰沛的草、树木、大象、狮子和犀牛的大草原。

trans.tranOther: A savannah is a large area of flat, grassy land, usually in Africa
